channel.title: Senaliesse on tlake.io
channel.description: Recent content in Senaliesse on tlake.io

item.title: Brigadier Taggart
item.description: Description An eladrin commander in the army of the Summer Court. Initially encountered by the Menagerie when they visited Lyra in the Summer Court as the forces of Winter were beginning to encroach.

item.title: Senaliesse
item.description: Map Key Info The name of the forest which houses the Summer Court. Divided into “Low” and “High”: Low Senaliesse, the forest floor and undergrowth. High Senaliesse, a complex network of bridges and structures made of shaped and grown trees, high in the staggering canopy of the forest.
